body_html:
The checkpoint is not sufficient to get the input placeholders. It is only the saved variables (which would be the weights and biases). You need to load a model from the graphdef and then load the checkpointed variables into that loaded graph.

See...
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim

body:
The checkpoint is not sufficient to get the input placeholders. It is only the saved variables (which would be the weights and biases). You need to load a model from the graphdef and then load the checkpointed variables into that loaded graph.

See...
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim
